hero_section_sub_headline: The right place to empower your company’s digital presence.
introduction_section_first_paragraph: What we do here at Profinder is connect companies and professionals, in the smartest possible way, through the use of our platform.
introduction_section_second_paragraph: In the area reserved exclusively for companies, you can find carefully selected IT staff who will meet all your needs, such as building and or expanding an IT department.
introduction_section_third_paragraph: Our goal is to put the customer's needs first so that we can offer the most efficient and customised service possible, so that our solutions can help your business express itself 100%.
newsletter_section_paragraph: Subscribe to our newsletter to keep up to date with our latest news!
why_us_section_first_card_paragraph: Hiring an IT professional through Profinder will give you access to the formula that will enable your company to cut costs and increase productivity from the get-go.
why_us_section_second_card_paragraph: We devote a lot of effort and energy to customer care because for us, you are the priority. That is why on a monthly basis you will be contacted with an email so that you can have the opportunity to give feedback on a Profinder professional you are working with, this allows us to keep the quality of our services as efficient as possible.
discover_app_section_first_paragraph: Welcome to our state-of-the-art platform! We are excited to show you how we can help you reach your goals. Whether you are a growing business, an independent professional or an enthusiast in our industry, there is much to explore here.
discover_app_section_second_paragraph: Our platform is designed to offer you a range of tools and services that will help you overcome daily challenges and grow rapidly. Here is what you can expect:
discover_app_section_first_description_c: We offer customised solutions to suit your specific needs. Whether you need consulting services, powerful software or training resources, we are here for you.
discover_app_section_second_description_: Our platform is powered by the latest technological innovations. We have invested in cutting-edge solutions to ensure that you have access to the most effective tools and the most up-to-date information.
services_section_sub_headline: Here are all the services you will find within the platform.

services_content.headline: E-commerce
services_content.paragraph: Creation or enhancement of an already existing platform, through the most modern services, the ability to make offers, promotions, email-marketing automation, back-office for shipments, orders, payments and products etc. Possibility of integrating the most modern payment services (paypal/stripe/cc).

services_content.headline: Web applications
services_content.paragraph: Development from scratch of a web-app including: customised design, integration of any existing API, 2FA (two-factor authentication), integrated back-office.

services_content.headline: Enterprise Software
services_content.paragraph: Design and development of enterprise software (ERP), personnel management, roles and permissions in the system, management of electronic invoicing and budgets, real-time monitoring of business processes.

services_content.headline: SEO-Digital Transformation
services_content.paragraph: Improved search engine indexing for your website, odience analysis, market analysis, analytics, rich data & SERPs, AMP.

services_content.headline: Web Design
services_content.paragraph: Designing web pages from scratch, improving the user experience for existing pages through design tools such as Figma, Sketch, AdobeXD.

technologies.headline: HTML5
technologies.paragraph: HTML (Hyper Text Markup Language) is the most widely used markup language on the Web. It is basically used to create and structure websites.

technologies.headline: CSS3
technologies.paragraph: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets), in computer science, is a language used to define the formatting of HTML, XHTML and XML documents, e.g. websites and related web pages.

technologies.headline: Javascript
technologies.paragraph: JavaScript is a multi-paradigm event-oriented programming language, commonly used in client-side web programming (later extended to the server side) for the creation, in websites and web applications, of dynamic interactive effects via script functions invoked by events triggered in turn in various ways by the user on the web page in use.

technologies.headline: Typescript
technologies.paragraph: TypeScript is an open source programming language developed by Microsoft. The language extends the syntax of JavaScript so that any program written in JavaScript is also able to run with TypeScript without any modifications. It was designed for the development of large applications and is intended to be compiled into JavaScript so that it can be interpreted by any web browser or app.

technologies.headline: React
technologies.paragraph: React is an open-source, front-end library for creating user interfaces and can be used as a basis in the development of single-page applications (SPA) and websites.

technologies.headline: Redux
technologies.paragraph: Redux is an open-source JavaScript library for managing and to organize application state. It is commonly used with libraries such as React.

technologies.headline: Next Js
technologies.paragraph: Next.js is an open source web development framework created by Vercel that enables React-based web applications with server-side rendering and static website generation.  Where traditional React apps can only render their content in the client-side browser, Next.js extends this functionality to include server-side rendered applications.

technologies.headline: Gatsby Js
technologies.paragraph: Gatsby is an open source static site generator based on Node.js using React and GraphQL. It provides over 2500 plugins to create static sites based on sources such as Markdown documents, MDX (Markdown with JSX), images and numerous content management systems such as WordPress, Drupal and more. From version 4, Gatsby also supports server-side rendering and static deferred generation for rendering dynamic websites on a Node.js server.

technologies.headline: GraphQL
technologies.paragraph: GraphQL is an open-source data query and manipulation language for APIs and a runtime for satisfying queries with existing data.

technologies.headline: Python/Django
technologies.paragraph: Django is an open-source Python-based Web framework that follows the template-template-views (MTV) model. Django's main goal is to facilitate the creation of complex database-driven websites. The framework emphasises reusability and "scalability" of components, less code, low coupling, fast development and the principle of non-repeatability.

technologies.headline: PHP/Laravel
technologies.paragraph: Laravel is an open-source PHP web framework intended for the development of web applications following the model - view - controller (MVC) architectural pattern.

technologies.headline: Python/Flask
technologies.paragraph: Flask is a micro web framework written in Python. It is classified as a microframework because it does not require any special tools or libraries. It has no database abstraction layer, form validation or other components where pre-existing third-party libraries provide common functions. However, Flask supports extensions that can add functionality to the application as if they were implemented in Flask itself.

technologies.headline: Nginx
technologies.paragraph: Nginx is a web server that can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, mail proxy and HTTP cache. Nginx is open source software, and most Web servers use Nginx.

technologies.headline: Docker
technologies.paragraph: Docker is a set of Platform as a Service (PaaS) products that use virtualization at the operating system level to deliver software in packages called containers. The software that hosts the containers is called Docker Engine.

technologies.headline: GCP(Google Cloud Platform)
technologies.paragraph: Google Cloud Platform (GCP), offered by Google, is a suite of cloud computing services that runs on the same infrastructure used internally by Google for its end-user products, such as Gmail, Google Drive and YouTube. In addition to a set of management tools, it provides a series of modular cloud services including computing, data storage, data analysis and machine learning.

technologies.headline: AWS(Amazon Web Service)
technologies.paragraph: Amazon Web Services, Inc. (AWS) is a subsidiary of Amazon that provides on-demand cloud computing platforms and APIs to individuals, businesses and governments, based on measured consumption. These cloud computing Web services provide distributed computing capabilities and software tools through AWS server farms.

faq_section_content.question: What is software outsourcing and what are its advantages?
faq_section_content.answer: Software outsourcing is a remote service that is provided by software development companies. The service can consist of services ranging from full software or mobile application development, design development, testing, to project launch and project support. So, in the simplest words, software outsourcing services is all about hiring a developer or a development team that is external to your company staff to help create or improve some digital products for your business. More time to stay focuse on the development of your business. Outsourcing your projects to us will grant you enough time to focus on growing your company as we carry out our services in the most efficient way for your business and without the need to involve you too much in this process.

subtitles.subtitle: More time to stay focused on the development of your business
subtitles.content: Outsourcing your projects to us will grant you enough time to focus on growing your company as we carry out our services in the most efficient way for your business and without the need to involve you too much in this process.

subtitles.subtitle: High Professional Development Team
subtitles.content: With our developers' team, you are guaranteed of highly experienced IT professionals at your disposal. For your project, we will hire only those engineers who meet your project requirements.

subtitles.subtitle: The product-oriented approach in software development
subtitles.content: While providing our software development services, we focus our efforts on your business goals and how our digital solutions will meet them.

faq_section_content.question: Which industries do we work with?
faq_section_content.answer: To provide the best services in the market we mainly focus our software development outsourcing services on product development for several primary industries:E-commerce Development Solutions Company Application Development Solutions Software Development For Real Estate Besides, we have a lot of successful projects in other industries like entertainment, financial, hospitality, media education and other.

faq_section_content.question: How long does it take to develop my project?
faq_section_content.answer: To start with, we review project requirements from the client, we get them analyzed and then inform you of the estimation results. Once you are fine with the cost and time, the next step would be to create a project report document and a proposal. Our business analyst will prepare this and then we send you the same for review. Once everything has been finalized we would then take the project to the next stage, which is the development stage.

faq_section_content.question: How much does it cost to set up a team?
faq_section_content.answer: We know that setting up a team can be a very time-consuming and costly procedure. That is why one of our main goals is to provide the customer with all the means necessary to maximise results and reduce costs.

faq_section_content.question: How do I get a estimate?
faq_section_content.answer: Contact us and book a video call through the contact form to find out more!

faq_section_content.question: How much control do I have over the development of my project?
faq_section_content.answer: You would retain full control over all stages in the development life cycle of your project. You can monitor the process through regular calls and meetings, track the status and exercise of every task. Within a set of meetings scheduled throughout the whole development cycle, we would inform you of the progress in regard to the project roadmap. We divide our entire work into sprints for ease of tracking and so you can make changes in the scope at any stage.

faq_section_content.question: How do we guarantee privacy?
faq_section_content.answer: We sign NDAs and Confidentiality Agreements as required by you. All our employees are full-time employees and are bound by company Confidentiality and Non-Disclosure clauses.Additionally, for sensitive projects, we can sign custom NDAs.

faq_section_content.question: How do we ensure the security and manage the risk of your project?
faq_section_content.answer: When you outsource your projects to our company, we not only provide software development services, but also handle all possible compliance and security issues. Our specialists assess all types of threats before creating your digital product, including privacy weaknesses, intellectual property compliance, third-party integrations, data management and more. This approach allows us to discover possible risks at the prospecting stage and create appropriate policies to prevent them.

faq_section_content.question: Do we have support and/or maintenance on the project?
faq_section_content.answer: In the early stages of development, we reserve up to 20 hours per month for support of your product. Our QA engineer can provide manual and automated testing of your product. After 2 months of project development, you will have access to key management personnel to solve any problems you may encounter with your product. Depending on the priority of the problem, your request can be resolved within 24 hours in cases of high urgency.

faq_section_content.question: Are there any payments if the project is cancelled?
faq_section_content.answer: No, you’re free from charges on any cancellation request in case you need us to stop working on the job. You just need to inform us one month before the job. So, we are able to close all current work on your project. In case you need to close your project development urgently, you will need to pay for 2 working weeks more. That is made to ensure that we fully cover all our developers' team remuneration and bonuses for working on your project.
